name: Ball Toss Flick Knockdown
description:
Ball Toss Knockdown is based on a traditional carnival type game that you have probably played before.

The challenge is to clear all the bottles stacked on top of each other in unique formation.

A player is given three balls in an attempt to clear the formation. See if you can clear them all!

It is a very challenging, fun game to play!

Features include:

* Beautiful, fun graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Smooth physics for nice gameplay
* Addictive gaming

Download right now!
